comment._content: Karl Juho Stålberg, first president of Finland: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kaarlo_Juho_St%C3%A5hlberg

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
pennylrichardsca:

Thanks for the further information on Mr. Ståhlberg. The photo has a very faint date on it of 10/19/25, so it appears to have been taken six months or so after he left office as President of Finland. We will add that information and his full name to the record when we update.
